name: Tear Down Your Idols
description:
Tear Down Your Idols

Welcome to the Revisionist Initative! 

As a revisionist, your task is to review the legacy of political figures.  Confront their personal history as you decide what to include in the national curicullum. 

Inspired by recent political events, this short narrative game is aimed to get players thinking about public figures that we decide to deify

---------------------------------------------------------

Simply click and play to progress the narrative and to engage in choices.

Make sure to use the arrows in the bottom right corner to go full screen.
